name: Janette_Dining_Chair
reviews: We purchased two of these chairs for a sitting area in our living room. Both chairs were defective in different ways! Neither came with directions. The first one had mislabeled screws, causing my husband to put a hole in the chair when he put a long screw in a short hole. For the second chair, the legs didn't fit into the leg holes. We ended up returning both of them. These chairs are total garbage. They are cute and a good price, but it's not worth it!!!!!!!!!
This chair is very comfortable. Assembly was easy for one chair, but on the second chair, the holes did not line up so I had to drill them out to assemble.
No made of good quality. Could not even use it to sit down. Have it as a display unit because it feels like is going to break !!
Corners a bit sloppy. Fabric could have been pulled better to make corners neater. For the price - its ok.

I use this chair as an office chair for my desk. It is a beautiful chair with a good height for my desk. The first chair I received had a crack in it and was returned promptly but the second chair I received was fine. It was easy to put together and overall I am happy with it.
description: Old-world charm meets modern style in this stunning Janette, Deco-inspired accent chair. This chair is constructed with sturdy, espresso-colored wooden legs and a toast-colored polyester fabric upholstery.Materials: Polyester/hardwoodFinish: EspressoUpholstery material: PolyesterUpholstery color: ToastUpholstery fill: FoamSeating comfort: MediumSeat dimensions: 18 inches high x 23 inches wide x 20 inches deepDimensions: 31 inches high x 25 inches wide x 23 inches deepStyleModernMaterialFabric, Foam, WoodFinishEspresso, WoodChair TypeAccent ChairsAssemblyAssembly RequiredChair Back HeightLow BackColorBeigeFurniture PatternSolid
